Class: SdpEndpoint

kwsMediaApi/endpoints~ SdpEndpoint

<abstract> new SdpEndpoint()

Implements an SDP negotiation endpoint able to generate and process offers/responses and that configures resources according to negotiated Session Description
Source:
  • lib/endpoints/SdpEndpoint.js, line 33

Methods

generateOffer(callback) → {module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint}

Request a SessionSpec offer. This can be used to initiate a connection.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
callback module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint.generateOfferCallback <optional>
Source:
  • lib/endpoints/SdpEndpoint.js, line 63
Returns:
The own media object
Type
module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint

getLocalSessionDescriptor(callback) → {module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint}

This method gives access to the SessionSpec offered by this NetworkConnection. .. note:: This method returns the local MediaSpec, negotiated or not. If no offer has been generated yet, it returns null. It an offer has been generated it returns the offer and if an answer has been processed it returns the negotiated local SessionSpec.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
callback module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint.getLocalSessionDescriptorCallback <optional>
Source:
  • lib/endpoints/SdpEndpoint.js, line 83
Returns:
The own media object
Type
module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint

getRemoteSessionDescriptor(callback) → {module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint}

This method gives access to the remote session description. .. note:: This method returns the media previously agreed after a complete offer-answer exchange. If no media has been agreed yet, it returns null.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
callback module:kwsMediaApi/endpoints~SdpEndpoint.getRemoteSessionDescriptorCallback <optional>
Source:
  • lib/endpoints/SdpEndpoint.js, line 103
Returns:
The own media object
Type
